meals.name: ASHPOLO
meals.desc: The recipe can be a challenge to cook correctly at first, but the challenge will prove well worth the effort because it is absolutely delicious.

meals.name: LEGHMEN
meals.desc: The long, thin noodles are generally served with fried lamb and fried seasonal vegetables.

meals.name: BIG PLATE CHICKEN
meals.desc: It combines an entire chicken with potatoes, fresh peppers and seasoned with dried chili peppers, served with noodle.

meals.name: SUYKASH
meals.desc: Uyghur Suykash or Minestrone soup is a very special and popular hand- made homemade fresh pasta soup.

meals.name: LAMB RIBS
meals.desc: About the meat, the fresher and younger the lamb is, the most tender and tasty the meat will be.

side.name: KAWAP
side.desc: They're seasoned with peppers, cumin and garnished with desired ingredients such as onion and egg.

side.name: SAMSA
side.desc: Samsa is a Tandoor (Tannur/Tannour) cooked dish which is usually made of a slightly salty dough that contains a filling of lamb and onion.

side.name: Tofu Recipe & Cucumber Salad
side.desc: Fried Tofu, spinach, which are full of nutrition and cucumber salad, which help hydrate your body and soul.

desserts.name: PICHENE
desserts.desc: it's a very simple and incredibly delicious treat with few ingredients and easy homemade, handmade recipe.

desserts.name: BAKKALI
desserts.desc: This sweet, nutty and yummy dessert is one of the main deserts whenever you have a festivals and parties!!

desserts.name: TWISTED DOUGHNUT
desserts.desc: Twisted doughnuts are eaten as snack and sometimes we combine it with milk tea, soups or salads.

drinks.name: Coca Cola
drinks.desc: Original / Diet Cock Small / Large cup

drinks.name: Pepsi Cola
drinks.desc: Original / Diet Pepsi Small / Large cup

drinks.name: Dark Coffee
drinks.desc: Hot Black Coffee -pulling shots and foaming milk best feeling

drinks.name: Cappuccino
drinks.desc: In Italian, cappuccino means 'little cap', which aptly describes the head of foamed milk that sits atop the drink's espresso base.

drinks.name: Earl Grey tea
drinks.desc: Best choice for great time after meal, enjoying delicious grey tea with some deserts.

drinks.name: Green tea
drinks.desc: Green tea is touted to be one of the healthiest beverages on the planet. It’s loaded with antioxidants that have many health benefits.
